Our ancestors survived the crusader invasion, survived the fetret period, succeeded in the victory of the Gallipoli and Liberation War.
Although all our books were burned, all our letters were played, and our civilization succeeded each time we built ourselves.
We will not be despairing, the fetret that we have experienced is temporary, and the betrayals we are going to melt away in the face of the nation.
This civilization is such a civilization that its false prophets, false fathers, heart empty draft scholarships have been condemned to the disposition of history.
Those who use science, power and blackmail as a tool of abuse for networking and organization have never accepted this civilization.

It is such a supreme authority to be able to serve Istanbul that it is necessary to understand the spirit, nature and philosophy of Istanbul in order to achieve this supreme prestige.
Those who do not understand Fethi and Fatih can not serve Istanbul.
We will not be from the ones who manage the populism, those who follow the Kafdagan, the ones who resort to the plans and the unprojected discourses.
The ancestor who made Konstantiniyye in Istanbul has nothing to give to Istanbul by an opposition that sees it as oppressive.
You have listened to the whole nation, you are viewing; after that you threatened with shame, without being embarrassed, and you are still continuing.
